title: Nothing contained herein shall adversely affect the approval and implementation of Slum Rehabilitation projects approved under BSUP, JNNUR Mission by the Central Sanctioning and Monitoring Committee, Ministry of Housing and Urban Poverty Alleviation, Government of India, or any such government schemes approved from time to time
